heading: 3. Part II of the First Schedule (as amended by Article 3 of the Food
text_raw:
3. Part II of the First Schedule (as amended by Article 3 of the Food 
Safety Authority of Ireland Act 1998 (Amendment of First Schedule) Order 
2021 (S.I. No. 152 of 2021)) to the Act is amended— 

(a) 

by deleting the following statutory instruments: 

“European Communities (Vinyl Chloride in Food) (Method 
of Analysis) Regulations 1984 (S.I. No. 92 of 1984)”; 

“European Communities (Flavourings for Use in Foodstuffs 
for Human Consumption) Regulations 1992 (S.I. No. 22 of 
1992)”; 

“European Communities (Certification of Animals and 
Animal Products) Regulations 1999 (S.I. No. 380 of 1999)”; 

“European Communities (Control on Imports of Animal 
Products from China) Regulations 2002 (S.I. No. 141 of 
2002)”; 

“European Communities (Suspending the Placing on the 
Market, the Importation and the Use in Manufacture of Jelly 
Confectionary containing the Food Additive E425 Konjac) 
Regulations 2002 (S.I. No. 442 of 2002)”; 

“European Communities (Registration of Importers of 
Animal Products) Regulations 2004 (S.I. No. 269 of 2004)”; 
and 

“European Union (Organic Farming) Regulations 2016 (S.I. 
No. 683 of 2016).”, and 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 12th May, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [222] 3 

(b) by inserting after “European Union (Imports of Animals and 
Animal Products from Third Countries) Regulations 2020 (S.I. 
No. 656 of 2020).” the following statutory instruments: 

“Designation Under Regulation 17 of the European Union 
(Official Controls 
to Food Legislation) 
Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 79 of 2020) (S.I. No. 329 of 
2022). 

in Relation 

European Union (Organic Farming) Regulations 2022 (S.I. 
No. 494 of 2022). 

Designation Under Regulation 17 of the European Union 
to Food Legislation) 
(Official Controls 
Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 79 of 2020) (S.I. No. 586 of 
2022).”.

EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

This Order amends the First Schedule to the Food Safety Authority of Ireland 
Act 1998. 

This Order may be cited as the Food Safety Authority of Ireland Act 1998 
(Amendment of First Schedule) Order 2023. 

For ease of reference, a list of all food legislation and official agencies, as 
contained in the First and Second Schedules to the Food Safety Authority of 
Ireland Act 1998, as well as a list of Regulations made under the European 
Communities Act 1972 and deemed to be food legislation for the purposes of 
the Food Safety Authority of Ireland Act 1998, and Regulations made under
